title: Texas School Shooter Is ... BLACK? Why the Media WON'T Cover It!
description:
There was a school shooting in Texas on Wednesday, yet for some reason the media isn’t interested in covering it. We explain why! HINT: It involves melanin. Also, the woke Left has their panties in a bunch over the new Dave Chappelle Netflix special. #DaveChappelle #TheCloser #TimothySimpkins
